summary: My Six Beautiful Characters mod, converted to six standalone followers, enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
Given many asked i decided to venture through that strange world, which is the Construction Kit, to try to convert my saved games
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35081/?) into followers and, well,
here they are :)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-DESCRIPTION-

This mod adds six standalone followers to the game;

Three of them are located at the Four Shields tavern in Dragon Bridge: Sonja, Leona, Valeria

The other three can be found at the Nightgate Inn located along the main road between Dawnstar and Windhelm: Trisha, Freya, Hope

Leona: Heavy Armor, Dual Wield
Sonja: Light Armor, Dual Wield
Hope: Heavy Armor, Two Handed
Trisha: Heavy Armor, Conjuration, Destruction
Freya: Conjuration, Destruction, Restoration
Valeria: Light Armor, Destruction, Restoration

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-INSTALLATION-

Download the "Six Beautiful Followers - Standalone", extract it in the main
folder of your skyrim game, and put a tick on the .esp file in the "Data
files" of the skyrim launcher, or on the mod manager


The optional files will work only if you install the main file first

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-STYLE NOTE-

Given i'm still relatively new to the Construction Kit, i had some problems
setting up the "accessories" for Hope and Freya given i don't know where
(around the many slots available) to place them...

To make up for that i made a list of the few accessories Hope and Freya are
missing; just download them if you want them to look as in the screens:

Freya is missing the following accessories:
Lustmord noir tasset - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852
Prince of the woods Belt Black - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008
Vixen Panties ("Temptress Race" mod, it also has the armors) - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717

Hope is missing the following accessories:
Silver Hotpants - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21271
Maxwell Leg Both - found on http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14668

These armors are NOT actually REQUIRED for the mod to work, it's just a few
accessories to contribute to these two characters' style


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-KNOWN ISSUES-

The "you could dress better..." dialog from the UFO (Ultimate Followers
Overhaul) mod has returned a headless mannequin for someone;

Proposed solution (courtesy of DJsphinx):

Open console
Target affected follower
Type: Disable - Press Enter
Type: Enable - Press Enter
Close console
save and reload or restart the game

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A note for UFO users:
the armors worn by the characters are flagged as "not playable" due to
various authors' requests, so the "you could dress better..." dialog
will always return a naked character

All the armors i used are linked in the -credits- section if you want to download and use them

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-ENB USED-
In case sombody wanted to know:
I used the "Project ENB" - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781
and the "True Vision ENB" - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15983
On my presentation screenshots

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-FINAL NOTE-

2017/8/25

I haven't played Skyrim nor logged in here for quite a long time now, so I
may not see (or have seen) many of the messages that may come through
the Nexus Forums' message board. To that end...

I give my permission to use, port, edit, modify my mod in anyway you see fit, for
any game or platform you'd like; just remeber to credit the authors.

I'm sorry I won't be of any "technical" use or help on said
ports/edits/modifications as I was a beginner user of the Construction
Kit then and I'd be a perfect stranger to it now...

Best regards to everyone and I sincerely hope that you all enjoy my mod :)
Cheers!

Lucas035
author: Lucas035
